creator: stefan.eissing@greenbytes.de
text:
In Tomcat 3.2.2:

The LocalStrings.properties in org.apache.tomcat.core have been
extended to include sc.207 (multistatus from RFC 2518), however
they are still missing the other codes defined by RFC 2518, namely:

sc.102=Processing
sc.422=Unprocessable Entity
sc.423=Locked
sc.424=Failed Dependency
sc.507=Insufficient Storage

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: *** Bug 2070 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text: Fixed in 3.2.3-dev.  Should be available in the next nightly build.
